messages.subject: Re: Teacher/Friend's comments about DD (8) not yet reading or writin
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra wrote: It s a plague, parents competing with each other to find out what s wrong with their absolutely normal children. I know you probably weren t
messages.messageBody:
Sandra wrote: It's a plague, parents competing with each other to find out
"what's
wrong" with their absolutely normal children.

I know you probably weren't referring to people like me, but I believe my
daughter is along the lines of sensory Integration dysfunction and we are
seeking, not a diagnosis, but a treatment. Not to demean her, but so that
we can find out ways that I can help her deal with things like anger without
hurting others. I could care less about the diagnosis. I want to be able
to help her. I hope that makes sense.

--
Roger, Amanda, Marti and Lilly

"I have never let my schooling interfere with my education" -Mark Twain
